about_the_game:
Welcome back to the world where you will only find liminality and loneliness... now with better graphics. But remember, don't get lost in this dream.

Overall Game Info:

The Solitude Project is a complete rework and a Spin-Off of A Liminal Place Legacy (also known as Remastered), now featuring HWRT (Hardware Ray Tracing) and Fully Simulated RT Lights (Psycho mode), better physics (at least a bit better), a new puzzle, improved optimization, and more! (Still no save function.) Find your way to the next level, do whatever you want! But remember... you will never find the exit.

But at least you’ll have some relaxing and nostalgic environments. The game is very short, but I’ll try to expand it with more DLCs or storylines.

Game made by a teenager.

Main Gameplay Features (Including missing features):

  • - Hardware Ray-Traced Reflections and GI.

  • - Fully Simulated Lightning (Ray Tracing / Path Tracing, optional)

  • - Better environments and better textures.

  • - Better optimization. 

  • - Music radios in some levels :D.

  • - Some floaties.

  • - Water physics (Missing).

  • - Footstep system (Missing).

  • - NO SAVES. (Not a feature, but let’s give it a go again.)

“The choice is yours, wanderer.”
